Description: Knob of lid of Chian, probably black-figured, Sphinx and Lion Style pottery stemmed bowl; white slip; underside reserved; exterior: top of knob black above band of narrow tongues between dilute lines; black band at junction with lid; band of tongues on lid.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Musée du Louvre. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2094) (phase 2)
